overview: Brian Tonry is responsible for all strategic and tactical aspects at ClickSafety, inclusive of sales, marketing, content, technology and finance. Previously, Brian was with Emporis GmbH, where he was the chief marketing officer, responsible for marketing and selling the world’s largest database of global building and real estate information. Before joining Emporis, he held a variety of key leadership positions over a 12-year career with The McGraw-Hill Companies, most recently as vice president of Analytics/Research and International Business Development with McGraw-Hill Construction. Before joining McGraw-Hill, Tonry was with Dow Jones, where he was responsible for technology and facilities management.
